dashboard.title: KalpanaAI Dashboard
dashboard.description: AI-powered tools to enhance your creativity and expand your reach.

artisanCircle.title: Artisan Circle
artisanCircle.description: Connect with AI-matched mentors for guidance.

storyStudio.title: Story Studio
storyStudio.description: Turn your product into a story that sells. Upload a photo and tell us about yourself.
storyStudio.backgroundPlaceholder: e.g., I'm a third-generation potter from Khurja...
storyStudio.missingInfoDescription: Please upload a photo and describe your background.
storyStudio.generationFailedDescription: Could not generate story. Please check the console for errors.

theMuse.title: The Muse
theMuse.description: Your design co-pilot. Upload a photo to explore new creative directions.
theMuse.uploadPrompt: Upload a photo to see design variations.
theMuse.generationFailedDescription: Could not generate designs. Please check the console.
